```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
z <- read.table("TRICHOMANES_PUNCTATUM_SSP.csv",header=TRUE,sep=",")
str(z)
summary(z)

print(z)

is.na(z)

library(skimr)
z <- na.omit(z)
skim(z)

library(ggplot2)
library(MASS)
p1 <- ggplot(data=z, aes(x=myVar, y=after_stat(density))) +
  geom_histogram(color="grey60",fill="cornsilk",size=0.2)
print(p1)
```
